Title: Glissando
Description: 3D piano visualization. Playback of MIDI files. Pitch/chord recognition test.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
3D piano visualization. Playback of MIDI files. Pitch/chord recognition test.



Features
  • 3D piano visualization
  • Input from MIDI devices
  • Output to MIDI devices
  • Playback of MIDI files
    • Loop
    • Change of tempo
    • Change volume (equalize)
    • Mute channels
  • Pitch/chord recognition test
  • Full-screen mode
  • Play glissandos with your mouse

Alpha features
  • Jam mode (peer-to-peer MIDI, not yet tested...)
  • Stereo 3D view

MIDI files
  • Kunst der Fuge
  • Midi World
  • Minnesota int. e-competiion
  • IAMMP piano rolls converted to MIDI
  • Midi studio consortium
  • Midi Bar
  • Bob Mace
  • John Roache
  • Tirol's midi works
  • Sample collection of Piano MIDI files

Requirements (for developers)
  • Microsoft .net Framework 3.5 SP1 install
  • VS2008 SP1

Components used
  • MIDI toolkit
  • Helix 3D toolkit
